products.title: Reebok Navy Knit Rib Jacket
products.description: Navy blue jacket, long sleeves, mesh lining,stand collar,a full zip closure,red lining running down cuffs and hem, two slant front pockets.

products.title: Newfeel Unisex Black Lightweight Shoes
products.description:
Bring back the joy of walking with these newfeel shoes. These shoes come with cool urban styling and a comfortable structure. Wear it for everyday walks or as a daily wear for your day-to-day chores around your block.

Upper



  • Soft upper made of mesh for enhanced ventilation for the feet

  • Synthetic leather overlays for added support to the upper

  • Reinforced overlay at backfoot and around toe box for enhanced foot support and durability

  • Lightly padded collar and tongue for added comfort and snug Fit

  • Lace-ups for snug fit and to lock the foot in place

  • Synthetic twill laces for durability

  • Stitch detailing for enhanced durability and subtle styling


Midsole



  • EVA midsole for soft cushioning and shock absorption, protecting the feet from impact

  • Removable footbed to accommodate an orthotic


Outsole



  • Flex grooves in multi-directional pattern for natural movement of the foot with utmost grip and stability

  • EssenSole insole with polyurethane insert to provide midfoot stability for maximum support on all terrains


Wash care
Wipe surface with soft, clean, damp cloth
Do not machine wash

products.title: ADIDAS Women Stripe Black Swimming Cap
products.description:
Composition
Silicon latex swimming cap

Wash Care
Hand wash with water at room temperature

Fitting
Snug Fit

This adidas swimming cap is made out of non-absorbent material to keep swimmers hair chlorine free and relatively dry. This swimming cap is ideal for swimmers with long or short hair.

products.title: Red Tape Brown Casual Men's Shoe
products.description:
Stylish and uber cool, these semi-formal boots with a pointed toe design from red tape add an extra bounce to your step. With a high quality leather upper and no laces, they are easy to wear and take off. They look great with jeans, chinos or even your formal trousers. Easy to look spectacular, classy and wow!

Upper
Leather upper for added durability and style
Pointed toe design for a more stylish look
Elastic gores on either side of the midfoot for a more versatile · · Fit
Leather haul loop to hang · · shoes from a · · backpack

Midsole
PU midsole for lightweight comfort and support
Leather inner lining and footbed with perforations  for absorbing moisture and keeping the feet dry, offering all-day comfort

Outsole
Lightweight rubber outsole with a wooden finish
Raised heel for ergonomic comfort and style

shoe care
Wipe leather surface with dry, clean cloth to remove dust
Use a branded leather conditioner to maintain shine
Do not store in direct sunlight
